reviewText: This show is one of my favorites and extremely enjoyable. I've watched this season (3) over and over again, because it was really good and the only season I had at the time. I love watching it and I don't hate any episodes, it is a great show and I enjoy watching it. Highly recommended.

reviewText: I love this show, and I never get sick of watching it. I don't have cable or satelite so I thought I would purchase the DVDs of one of my favorite shows. Purchased as used, however the condition was very good, extremely well taken care of and all the discs are readable.

reviewText: In the third season, Grounded For Life found itself going from Fox to the WB. It was a messed up season in that 3 episodes aired on Fox and 8 on the WB. But this 2 DVD set will contain 13 episodes. So you'll get to see 2 episodes that never aired on either network.There will also be commentary tracks on 6 of the episodes so we'll get the inside tales of what went on during the season the show jumped networks. Lily and Sister Helen will be speaking.Even though ABC Family Channel reruns the show, I enjoy them better on DVD - especially since I don't have to watch 10 minutes of ads to get through each episode. It's a shame that Sundance or IFC doesn't rerun the show because Donal and Kevin make this an Indie Film Sitcom.
summary: The Year the Show Bounced between Fox & WB
